class Lambda[source]

Lambda(user=None, pw=None, sessionToken=None, region='ap-southeast-1')

for invoking lambda functions

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lambda_ = Lambda(
    user = USER,
    pw = PW,
    region = 'ap-southeast-1'
)
lambda_.invoke(
    functionName= 'lambda-pip' ,
    input = {'test':'test'}, 
    invocationType= 'RequestResponse' 
)

{'statusCode': 200, 'body': '"Hello from Lambda!"'}
{% endraw %}
